reviewDescription: My 4 year old LOVES this! I recently started embroidering and she always asks to help, so I wanted to find her a kid-friendly and safe version she could do on her own. This sewing kit is perfect for her! I appreciate the pre-cut holes so she can confidently sew everything by following along the lines. The plastic “needles” are a great size for small hands and zero risk of injury. The stickers were a lot of fun to put on and easily numbered so you know exactly which ones go with each project. The fabric is strong enough for eager hands to work with, but still soft enough for her to play with and cuddle. Overall extremely happy with this purchase, will definitely be ordering again.

reviewTitle: Great beginner sewing kit for kids!
reviewDescription: I got this sewing kit for my daughter and she absolutely loved it! Everything inside is colorful, easy to use, and perfect for beginners. The instructions are simple to follow, and all the pieces are safe for kids. It kept her busy for hours in a fun and creative way. What I really like is that it helps build focus and hand-eye coordination while still feeling like a game. The quality of the materials is surprisingly good, and nothing felt cheap. If you’re looking for a cute, engaging craft activity for kids, this kit is definitely worth it!

reviewDescription: So my 5 year old granddaughter asked me to teach her to sew. This worked perfectly for a 5 year old beginner. Everything she needed was right in the box and it was explained with pictures so she understood it! When she finished her first project which is considered the practice project, she called everyone in the family. It’s a great kit for beginners and seem s be holding up quite well also! Highly recommend!
reviewedIn: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2025

reviewDescription: My daughter loves this she is 7 and is wanting me to find more patterns to be a tiny bit harder now. I love how it starts easy and then as you go the patterns become more difficult. The last pattern has taken her a little bit longer, but I think she would go faster if she knew there were more patterns to do so she’s kind of paused on it. The durability is perfect. It’s not too frail and needle is perfect for a young child to begin with. I would recommend this for any kid that wants to learn how to sew. We’ve made a little basket full of her sewing stuff and now are going to see if they offer any more patterns. We just need to improve her knots as well.
